attributes.action: Support the passing of the sexual orientations legislation in England and Wales
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We think the regulations making it an offence to deny services to people on the basis of their sexuality, something which they cannot change, are overdue.  

We believe that these regulations should be passed as soon as possible and out-dated religious ideas believed by a small minority should not be an obstacle.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
